column4: is the xinerama the right method to expand my laptops view to a external screen ?
Depends on what release. If it's pre-edgy, yes.
Then there's something else (I've been told) ... but I've not tested it myself.
Don't remember - just asked a friend of mine who was the one who mentioned it to me.
All my workstations are either pre-edgy or different distros, so I'm using xinerama.
... ok ... i will try looking into xinerama and get it working ... i just asked because i also read something about twinview and could not distinguish whats the right method
meaning the descent method ... thank u so far
It might be that twinview is the 'new' thing.
And IIRC he mentioned that xinerama no longer works - but as I say, I've not tested myself.
.. oh thats not to good info
He's said "Dualview" is the name of the new 'thing'
Let me know how you get on with it.
Apparently my friend made up the word 'DualView' - he actually meant 'TwinView'.
I have mocked him and applied appropriate derision ;-)
Also, he has now pointed out that it might only be something to do with nVidia chipsets only... http://www.killminus9.net/index.php?article=16#updates
